product_name: Nite Ize Pack-A-Poo Dog Waste Bag
long_description: Being a responsible dog owner shouldn't stink. The Nite Ize Pack-A-Poo dog waste bag helps you contain the smell when you clean up after your furry friend. Interior pocket is lined with metallic fabric that creates an effective odor barrier; flexible Gear Tie seals the pocket shut after you place a filled waste baggie inside. On the exterior, 2 S-Biner clips and a rip-and-stick belt loop offer convenient attachment points for multiple carrying options. Convenient accessory pockets hold disposable waste bags or hand sanitizer (both sold separately). The Nite Ize Pack-A-Poo dog waste bag is durable and machine washable.
short_description: Being a responsible dog owner shouldn't stink. The Nite Ize Pack-A-Poo dog waste bag helps you contain the smell when you clean up after your furry friend.
